dcterms:creator: N. Malandrakis
A. Potamianos
G. Evangelopoulos
A. Zlatintsi
dcterms:description: The extended COGNIMUSE dataset consists of 12 movie clips: seven half-hour continuous movie clips from the original COGNIMUSE dataset and five extra half-hour Hollywood movie clips. Valence and arousal are annotated in the range of [-1, 1] by several subjects.
dcterms:title: Extended COGNIMUSE dataset

dcterms:creator: A. Zlatintsi
P. Koutras
G. Evangelopoulos
N. Malandrakis
N. Efthymiou
K. Pastra
A. Potamianos
P. Maragos
dcterms:description: The COGNIMUSE dataset is a multimodal video database annotated with saliency, events, semantics, and emotion with application to summarization. It includes seven half-hour Hollywood movie clips.
dcterms:title: COGNIMUSE dataset
